items.title: Cow Head Lighthouse
items.description:
jimmywayne posted a photo:

Cow Head, Newfoundland

The cast iron lighthouse was constructed in 1909 and used until 1979.

Historic sign:
www.flickr.com/photos/auvet/53915296465/in/datetaken-public/
items.author: nobody@flickr.com ("jimmywayne")
items.tags: lighthouse cowhead sunset newfoundland newfoundlandlabrador historic castiron

items.title: Silver Lining and Rays
items.description:
kevin-palmer posted a photo:

- www.kevin-palmer.com - The sun went down behind a distant thunderstorm, complete with a silver lining and crepuscular rays.
items.author: nobody@flickr.com ("kevin-palmer")
items.tags: bighornmountains bighornnationalforest wyoming july summer evening sunset clouds sky colorful nikond780 nikon180mmf28 telephoto rays silverlining orange

items.title: Treetop Sunset
items.description:
kevin-palmer posted a photo:

- www.kevin-palmer.com - I spent 3 nights camping near this scenic overlook while escaping the 100°F heat in the valley. And each evening the sunset just kept getting better. Most of the smoke cleared out as well.
items.author: nobody@flickr.com ("kevin-palmer")
items.tags: bighornmountains bighornnationalforest wyoming july summer evening sunset clouds sky colorful nikond780 tamron2470mmf28 cliff gold golden

items.title: Rocks of Freeze Out
items.description:
kevin-palmer posted a photo:

- www.kevin-palmer.com - Many of the rock formations here are inaccessible, at least without climbing equipment.
items.author: nobody@flickr.com ("kevin-palmer")
items.tags: bighornmountains bighornnationalforest wyoming july summer evening sunset clouds sky colorful nikond780 tamron2470mmf28 cliff orange
